name: Core Smash!
description:
Fire the balls to break through to the core and smash it!

Upgrade your gun and and become unstoppable!

How long will you last??

Game Features:
- Free to play
- Endless gameplay
- Simple controls
- Challenge your friends with the best highscore
- 54 Challenges
- 6 Bosses
- 7 Unique Abilities
- Over 80 Skins to unlock
- 100 Ranks to work your way through
